Name: Suva
Description: Suva (population 176,000) is the capital of Fiji.

Name: Levuka
Description: Levuka is a town on the eastern coast of the Fijian island of Ovalau, which is one of the Lomaiviti Islands.

Name: Nadi
Description: Nadi (pronounced as "Nandi") is the airport town on the west coast of Viti Levu, Fiji's largest island.

Name: Nausori
Description: Nausori, dubbed "the Paradise of the Green" is one of the towns of Fiji.

Name: Taveuni
Description: Taveuni is the third largest island in Fiji.  It has the distinction of being one of the few places (other than Northeastern Russia and Antarctica) where the 180th meridian crosses land.  It rains here a lot, so be prepared and do not wait until it stops raining.  Do not trust weather forecasts.

Name: Nananu-i-Ra Island
Description: Nananu-i-ra is a small island about 1.5km off of the north coast of Viti Levu, in Fiji.

Name: Ovalau
Description: Ovalau is the principal island and seat of local government of the Lomaiviti Islands in Fiji.
